alert.note: Alert for Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:23PM CDT until July 13 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Leflore County in north central Mississippi... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Money, or near Itta Bena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Money around 235 PM CDT. Greenwood around 250 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Schlater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
